welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vallauris, the charming city known for its exquisite pottery and beautiful beaches. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the unique culture and stunning landscapes of this wonderful destination."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mandelieu Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fontvieille Heliport Airport serves as the primary hub for all incoming and outgoing helicopter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's WiFi network for free while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited usage for all passengers.
